action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A baseball player in a white uniform with gold trim is batting. He is wearing a black helmet and is swinging a wooden bat. He is facing the pitcher, who is not visible in the image. There is a catcher in a blue uniform crouching behind home plate. An umpire in black is standing behind the catcher. The background is a baseball field with green grass and a dirt infield. There is a white ball in the air.

There is a brick building in the background. There is a car in the background. There is a woman in the foreground. There are trees and bushes in the foreground.
